title: WTB: T205 Pirates GD or Better, Paypal Ready
author: mintacular

posts.post_title: WTB: T205 Pirates GD or Better, Paypal Ready
posts.post_content:
Looking to buy any of these T205 Pirates, back brand does not matter. Would consider graded (SGC, PSA, BVG) or raw.  GD or better with no paper loss, huge creasing, or any obscene issue etc. No trimmed card either.  

Here are the ones I need:  Clarke, Gibson, Leifield, updated 10/8

Thank you very much, please send scans and $ DLVD, I'm paypal ready. -Pat
